Class.name: REDIS.Terminal.ErrorHandler
Class.Description: Class for handling all errors that can uprise during using REDIS-CACHE

Method.name: ParamExceeded
Method.Description: If max parameters were exceeded while calling function
Method.Implementation:
set result = $Char(27)_"[31m"_" <Error>: Cannot run command """_$LIST(cmdPipeline,1)_""""_ " You exceeded maximum of parameters(max "_maxParameters_"), you entered: "_($LISTLENGTH(cmdPipeline)-1)_$Char(27)_"[0m"
return result

Method.name: SyntaxError
Method.Description: If any syntax error occurs at anytime

Method.name: UndefinedFunction
Method.Description: If some funcitons is not implemented or not supported (for example help for "help")
Method.Implementation:
set result = $Char(27)_"[31m"_" <Error>: Cannot run command """_$LIST(cmdPipeline,1)_""""_ ", function """_$LIST(cmdPipeline,paramIndex)_""" is undefined"_$Char(27)_"[0m"
return result

Method.name: NotNumber
Method.Description: If given value from user/programmer is not clear number
Method.Implementation:
set result = $Char(27)_"[31m"_" <Num-Error>: Setted value """_$LIST(cmdPipeline,5)_""" is "_ "not an integer or out of range"_$Char(27)_"[0m"
return result
